code: import{GLOBALTYPES}from"../actions/globalTypes";var initialState={};var alertReducer=function alertReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GLOBALTYPES.ALERT:return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default alertReducer;
